name: Oni
description: An Oni has blue or green skin, large tusks, and horns. It can assume different forms, such as a human or a large ogre, and wields powerful magic and a glaive.
memorable: Oni are known for their ability to infiltrate human settlements disguised as common folk, spreading chaos and preying on the weak.
goals: To sow chaos, deceive adventurers, and feast on the weak.
relations: Oni may have ties to other malevolent outsiders or be found in the company of other giants.
environment: Typically found in human settlements or locations where they can deceive and manipulate others.
strengths: Possesses both physical prowess and a variety of magical abilities, including invisibility and regeneration.
weaknesses: Lacks mobility beyond flying, and can be diminished by restorative spells or abilities.
attacks: Multiattack with claws or glaive, delivering slashing and additional force damage. Ranged Arcane Bolt attack deals force damage.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration: the Oni regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 HP.
equipment: Glaive that adjusts in size when it changes form.
skills: Proficient in Deception and Arcana, uses cunning and magical knowledge to navigate encounters.
additional_information: Can cast darkness and invisibility at will.
Can create a magical wind with its Whirling Glaive ability.
Weapon attacks deal additional force damage.
Shape-shifting ability allows for tactical versatility.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability using Charisma, allowing it to cast spells like charm and sleep once per day.
test_queries: Oni disguised as a human causing chaos
cruel outsider that preys on the weak
giant that flies and uses magic
